description: Configuration for Claude Onshore Conversion Agent - Customize paths for your machine
inputDirectoryDescription: Path to the OnShore legacy VB.NET codebase

paths.pathsDescription: Relative paths within the inputDirectory to find legacy source files

referenceProjects.description: Reference projects showing ASP.NET Core MVC patterns and examples

targetProjects.description: Target projects where generated code will be placed (BargeOps.Admin.Mono monorepo structure)

notes: All paths should use double backslashes (\\) for Windows paths
Update inputDirectory to point to your OnShore legacy codebase
Update referenceProjects to point to your BargeOps.Crewing projects
Update targetProjects to point to your BargeOps.Admin.Mono monorepo
The 'paths' object contains relative paths within inputDirectory
